divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out to call my cat in at about 9:20 pm. The night was crystal clear and very cold. January 30th, 2009. Something caught my peripheral sight line and I couldn't believe what I saw. It was a huge vee shaped object that sat as if painted on the night sky. It was motionless and had no sound. The wing span on each side had to be 60 - 100 feet or so. Each wing had four, round white lights. The craft stayed in that same position for at least fifteen minutes. I had enough time to call my neighbor to see it and my daughter as well. (My daughter reports that she remembers the craft changing shape, into a long line from the vee. Suddenly, a small red light at the apex of the vee came on and the craft disappeared. Again, it disappeared without any sound or visual trail. A similar event took place in April of that same year. I saw a white light coming across the top of the Mountains and for some reason I just knew it was the same craft returning. I ran outside, called my husband to come and look and this time saw a smaller craft with only two lights on each wing, again, white round lights. The craft stayed a shorter time and more or less disappeared in the same way...instantaneously. I would be happy to discuss this with you.In retrospect, I remember feeling puzzled at the sight, then excited and then somewhat fearful.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around January 30th 2009
Summary: Saw huge vee shape, with four large round lights on each wing. Motionless, no sound, close by hanging in sky.
